body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our company. My name is Timothy Gonzales and I am with XYZ Company. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Andrea. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is A-P-O-W-E-L-L at domain dot com, and my phone number is five five five - two two two - four four four four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Andrea. We have noted your email address as A-P-O-W-E-L-L at domain dot com and your phone number as five five five - two two two - four four four four. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Andrea. Thank you for your time. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
